original_title: Pi’õ rómnha ma’ubumrõi’wa - Mulheres Xavante Coletoras de Sementes
overview: A sensitive account of the work of collecting seeds that Xavante women do in their territory.  The short records how they collect in the field and how they learned to organize themselves to count, weigh and deliver orders.
title: Pi’õ rómnha ma’ubumrõi’wa - Mulheres Xavante Coletoras de Sementes
